item.title: Build a RSpec CI Pipeline Using Jenkins and Docker
item.description: Background Due to the lack of CI, I have to run RSpec manually every time I am about to merge my feature branch into master branch. It’s an exhausting and forgettable yet important chore. People are unreliable, however, it is just a matter of time before something goes wrong. That’s why I decided to build our CI pipeline to run RSpec. CI Options I have CircleCI and Jenkins under consideration. However, we have to pay to use CircleCI.
